meanings.sent1: The heritrices inherited the family estate.
meanings.sent2: She was the heritrix of her grandmother's fortune.

meanings.sent4: The heritrices carried on the legacy of their ancestors.
meanings.sent5: The heritrices were proud to continue the family line.
